### Data: make change data (similar to EBBA2 change)

```{r, eval = F, include = T}
# For each species we create list of unique cell_labels and if they intersect they get a "stable", if they differ,they either get "colonized" or "extinct".
change_list_atlas <- list()
change_list_sp<- list()

for (a in seq_along(dat)){
  
  # subset for one atlas
  atlas1 <- dat[[a]] %>% 
    # only use the good cells:
    filter(num_periods_sp == 2 & num_periods_cells == 2) %>% 
    # reduce columns:
    select(cell_label, dataset, cell_lat, cell_long, verbatim_name, geom, tp)
  
  # species list for one atlas to loop through
  sp_list <- unique(atlas1$verbatim_name) %>% na.omit()
  
  for (sp in seq_along(sp_list)){
    # subset for one species
    atlas1sp <- atlas1 %>% filter(verbatim_name == sp_list[sp]) 
    
    # cells sampled in tp 1
    cells1 <- atlas1sp %>% filter(tp == 1) %>% pull(cell_label) %>% unique()
    
    # cells sampled in tp 2
    cells2 <- atlas1sp %>% filter(tp == 2) %>% pull(cell_label) %>% unique()
    
    # classify cells by: stable, colonized, extinct 
    stable <- intersect(cells1, cells2)
    colonized <- setdiff(cells2, cells1) 
    extinct <- setdiff(cells1, cells2)
    
    # make new data with merged TP with change column:
    change <- atlas1sp %>% 
      select(-tp) %>% 
      unique() %>%
      group_by(cell_label) %>%
      mutate(Change = factor(case_when(
      cell_label %in% stable ~ "stable",
      cell_label %in% colonized ~ "colonized",
      cell_label %in% extinct ~ "extinct",
      .default = NA
    ))) %>% ungroup()
    
    change_list_sp[[sp]] <- change
    
  }
  
  change_df_sp <- do.call(rbind, change_list_sp)
  change_list_atlas[[a]] <- change_df_sp
  
}

## Merge atlas list to dataframe
change_sf <- do.call(rbind, change_list_atlas)

# merge change with trends data
change_sf2 <- left_join(change_sf, trends)

## save RDS
saveRDS(change_sf2, "../../out/rds/ChangeDataSf.rds")

```

## Mean trend per cell for summary maps

```{r}
Change_per_cell <- change_sf2 %>% 
  group_by(dataset, cell_label) %>%
  mutate(Change_num = case_when(
    Change == "stable" ~ 0,
    Change == "extinct" ~ -1,
    Change == "colonized" ~ 1,
    .default = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(cell_mean_change = mean(Change_num)) %>% 
  select(dataset, cell_label, cell_mean_change) %>%
```

# Make maps for all species in all Atlases:
```{r}
## Add Fractal Dimension to plot:
FracD <- readRDS("../../out/rds/AllPredictors.rds") %>% 
  distinct(dataset, tp, verbatim_name, log_R2_1, D_AOO_a, AOO, IUCN)


#
out_paths <- c("../../out/ChangeMaps/CZ/",
               "../../out/ChangeMaps/NY/",
               "../../out/ChangeMaps/JP/",
               "../../out/ChangeMaps/EBBA/")
atlas_names <- unique(change_sf2$dataset)

for (atlas in seq_along(atlas_names)){
  atlas_sf <- change_sf2 %>% 
    filter(dataset == atlas_names[atlas])
  
  species_list <- atlas_sf %>%
    pull(verbatim_name) %>% 
    unique()
  
  for (species in seq_along(species_list)){
    
    species_sf <- atlas_sf %>% 
      filter(verbatim_name == species_list[species])
    
    D <- FracD %>% 
      filter(verbatim_name == species_list[species] & dataset == atlas_names[atlas]) %>%
      pull(D_AOO_a) %>% 
      unique()
    IUCN <- FracD %>%
      filter(verbatim_name == species_list[species] & dataset == atlas_names[atlas]) %>%
      pull(IUCN) %>% 
      unique()
    
    # Plot
    ggplot() +
      geom_sf(data = grids[[atlas]], col = "grey", fill = "lightgrey" )+
      geom_sf(data = species_sf,  aes(fill = Change), size = 1.2) +
      geom_sf(data = countries_list[[atlas]],  col = "black", fill = NA)+
      scale_fill_manual(
        values = c(stable = "#f7f7f7",
        colonized = "#998ec3",
        extinct = "#f1a340")) +
      theme_void()+
      labs(title = paste(species_list[species], "-", atlas_names[atlas]), ## Atlas
           subtitle = paste(species_sf %>% pull(trend) %>% unique(), ## Trend
                            "- Log Change = ", species_sf %>% 
                                  pull(log_R2_1) %>% unique(), "\n", ## Log Ratio
                            "D 1 = ", D[1], " // D 2 = ", D[2], "\n",
                            "IUCN = ", IUCN))
    
    
    ggsave(plot = last_plot(), paste0(out_paths[atlas], gsub(" ", "_", species_list[species]),
                                         "_ChangeMap.pdf"))
    
    rm(species_sf, D)
  }
  rm(atlas_sf)
}



```

# Example species predictor data:
```{r}

predictors <- readRDS("../../out/rds/Final_data.rds")

change_sf2 %>% 
  filter(verbatim_name %in% c(species, sp$verbatim_name)) %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  distinct(dataset, verbatim_name, trend, log_R2_1) %>% 
  left_join(predictors) %>%
  select(dataset, verbatim_name, trend, log_R2_1, tp, 
         D_AOO_a, AlphaSR_sp, AtlasCOG_lat, rel_nsDist, sp_centr_lon,
         moran, rel_AOO)
```
